certificationRecords.title: certificationRecords
certificationRecords.description:
A list of certifications available to take based on the chosen career. Ask the user to pick a specific certification to view more information or to view the required modules needed to attain/complete the chosen certification.
Provide concise responses with key information only, unless the user explicitly requests more details.

errorMessage.title: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The error or system message from the action. Follow the instructions provided and grant the user a general response about the error message.
